name: static-hanna-css-starter
description: Starter repo, for writing your own CSS using TypeScript and leveraging Hanna design system's CSS variables/helpers
author: Reykjavík (http://www.reykjavik.is)

scripts.start: yarn run build  &&  yarn run server
scripts.build: yarn install  &&  yarn run build:prep  &&  yarn run build:js  &&  NODE_ENV=production yarn run build:css --minify
scripts.dev: yarn install  &&  yarn run build:prep  &&  yarn run build:assets:dev  &&  concurrently -k  "yarn run server:dev"  "yarn run build:js:watch "  "yarn run build:css:watch" "yarn run build:assets:watch"
scripts.build:assets:watch: onchange 'assets/**' -f add -f change -- yarn run build:assets
scripts.build:css:watch: onchange '_build_temp/**/*.js' -f add -f change -- yarn run build:css --prettify
